question: Which Indian business leader received an ‘Award for Excellence in Business’ by the Egyptian Government at the Women Economic Forum 2020?
explanation:
The Chairperson of Modi Enterprises, Dr Bina Modi has been presented the ‘Award for Excellence in Business’ by the Egyptian Government at the Women Economic Forum 2020.
Dr Bina took over as the Chairperson of Modi Enterprises in November 2019. She was presented the award by renowned Egyptian political scientist. Dr Maya Morsy, the President of National Council of Women (NCW).
